content: For those of you using spreadsheets for profiles... hopefully just @Eric Haas and @Brett Marquard - as of now, I am changing the spreadsheet rules a little
I assume you will list or point to the rule changes? And what is the recommendation now for R4 profiling?
now, for Observation.quantity[x], if you want to constrain it to a quantity, you just launch right into Observation.valueQuantity and constrain this. This implies that quantity is the only type
in the future, you will need to be specific that quantity is the only one allowed. That means that you must explicitly have an Observation.value[x] with a type of Quantity
I think that this just applies to R4 profiles. I haven't started to trying to figure out how to isolate this change from R3.... nightmare....
no. changed my mind. This change is a mightmare....

I know there are some non-HL7 projects that were using spreadsheets for older release stuff and I doubt they're monitoring here. (On the other hand, I'm not sure where they would be monitoring, so hard to say how best to communicate with them.)
OK but I am confused if this change is happening or not... "no. changed my mind. This change is a mightmare...."
at the moment, this change is not happening after all. But I reserve the right to change my mind again. This is a particularly difficult change to implement
